channel.title: Adding Multiple Attack animations/Nex
channel.description:
Ok so I a currently using Mezzyscape 657 as a base and am currently configuring an npc, but I do not know how to add multiple attack animations. I think It should go into NpcDefinitions.java but im not to sure.. Anyways I searched google,yahoo mopar and other RSPS sites and cannot find any thing on this. So, any help at all would be higly appreciated.Thank you,
-Corey
